body_html: First I guess this should not be posted here. So you initialized the weights to ones like wih = np.ones((15,784)), which makes the network symmetric and hard to train. You should initialize the weights to small small random values.
body_text: First I guess this should not be posted here. So you initialized the weights to ones like wih = np.ones((15,784)), which makes the network symmetric and hard to train. You should initialize the weights to small small random values.
body: First I guess this should not be posted here. So you initialized the weights to ones like `wih = np.ones((15,784))`, which makes the network symmetric and hard to train. You should initialize the weights to small small random values.
